playSoundRepeatedlyUntilAlarmStopped: Play the sound repeatedly until the alarm is stopped
setSpecificVolumeForThisAlarm: Set a specific volume for this alarm
reportBugOrFeature: Report a bug or ask for a feature
privacyDescription: No data is collected. Everything absolutely stays on your device. No back-end. 100% offline.
builtWithLove: Built with ❤️ by Gautier de Lataillade
hapticFeedbackDescription: Light vibration when tapping on buttons

onboarding1.title: Record your morning boost
onboarding1.description: Your voice, your energy, your message to wake up to.

onboarding2.title: Set your alarm
onboarding2.description: And link it to your motivating recording.

onboarding3.title: Wake up
onboarding3.description: Start your day with your own words.

allowNotificationsDescription:
To make sure your alarm works reliably, Echo Wake needs permission to send you notifications. This is essential so you never miss your wake-up call!

We only use notifications to alert you when your alarm goes off. No spam, ever.
microphonePermissionDescription: In order to be able to record audio, Echo Wake needs permission to access your microphone. Please continue to the settings to grant permission.
aRecordingWithThisNameAlreadyExists: A recording with this name already exists
warningNotificationOnKillDescription: Your alarms may not ring if the app is killed. Tap here to reopen the app.
